g.text: ["AA has not interacted with this CB before"]
w/ nacl signed request to fetch an API Bearer Token
Provide an API token which can be used to authenticate GET requests,
provide rate limiting on agent by agent basis, etc
AA constructs a Data Rights Request and submits to CB's API
CB informs Agent request is acknowledged
Process request through normal DSR process
Need additional verification of consumer identity
direct user to visit a specific URL.
User visits URL in browser or webview and provides verification
move request forward in state machine
CB inform Agents request is in progress
CB inform Agents request is denied
Request sequence terminates. A request can be denied for a number of
CB inform Agents request is complete
User may have results URL to download or view in browser or user agent
